trans-unit.source: “Batteries included” packaging – Gridsync bundles will include Tahoe-LAFS and all required dependencies for a frictionless installation experience; no python installation or manual compilation is required.
trans-unit.target: “包含电池”的包装– Gridsync软件包将包括Tahoe-LAFS和所有必需的依赖关系，以实现无摩擦的安装体验；无需python安装或手动编译。

trans-unit.source: “Native” look and feel – Gridsync uses the Qt application framework, emulating native widgets on all target platforms; the user can expect Gridsync to behave like any other desktop application.
trans-unit.target: “本机”外观– Gridsync使用Qt应用程序框架，在所有目标平台上模拟本机窗口小部件；用户可以期望Gridsync像其他桌面应用程序一样运行。

trans-unit.source: ) will not run on older distributions. Accordingly, if you intend to distribute Gridsync binaries for use on a wide range operating system versions, it is recommended that you build the application on as old of a system as is reasonable for a given platform (i.e., one which can build and run Gridsync but which still receives security updates). Presently, CentOS 7, macOS “Mojave” (10.14), and Windows Server 2012 R2 arguably constitute the most suitable candidates for GNU/Linux, macOS, and Windows build systems respectively (insofar as binaries generated on these systems will be forward-compatible with all others in that platform-category that are still supported upstream).
trans-unit.target: ）将无法在较早的发行版上运行。因此，如果您打算分发Gridsync二进制文件以在广泛的操作系统版本上使用，则建议您在给定平台合理的前提下，在尽可能旧的系统上构建应用程序（即，可以构建和运行Gridsync的平台）但仍会收到安全更新）。目前，CentOS 7，macOS“ Mojave”（10.14）和Windows Server 2012 R2可以分别构成最适合GNU / Linux，macOS和Windows构建系统的候选对象（因为在这些系统上生成的二进制文件将向前兼容）。该平台类别中仍受上游支持的所有其他类别）。

trans-unit.source: , or
trans-unit.target: ， 要么

trans-unit.source: Tor support (experimental) – Gridsync can tunnel outgoing connections through the Tor anonymity network, concealing users’ network location from storage service providers and each other.
trans-unit.target: Tor支持（实验性的）– Gridsync可以通过Tor匿名网络建立传出连接的隧道，从而使用户的网络位置与存储服务提供商之间以及彼此之间保持隐蔽。

trans-unit.source: A graphical user interface for managing primary Tahoe-LAFS functionality (e.g., starting, stopping, configuring gateways) – the user will never have to edit a text file by hand or touch the command line.
trans-unit.target: 图形用户界面，用于管理Tahoe-LAFS的主要功能（例如，启动，停止，配置网关）–用户将无需手动编辑文本文件或触摸命令行。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, Windows users who do not wish to use the executable installer can download and verify Gridsync-Windows.zip, extract the enclosed “Gridsync” folder anywhere, and run
trans-unit.target: 另外，不希望使用可执行安装程序的Windows用户可以下载并验证Gridsync-Windows.zip，在任何位置提取随附的“ Gridsync”文件夹，然后运行

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, users can use PyInstaller to generate a more “portable” binary distribution of Gridsync and Tahoe-LAFS (suitable for running on other machines of the same platform) by installing the required dependencies and typing
trans-unit.target: 或者，用户可以通过安装所需的依赖项并键入PyInstaller来生成Gridsync和Tahoe-LAFS（适合在同一平台的其他计算机上运行）的更“便携式”二进制发行版

trans-unit.source: Automated bi-directional file synchronization – Gridsync will monitor local and remote directories, seamlessly storing or retrieving new versions of files as they appear (using Tahoe-LAFS’ “Magic Folder” feature [*] ).
trans-unit.target: 自动化的双向文件同步– Gridsync将监视本地和远程目录，无缝地存储或检索新版本的文件（使用Tahoe-LAFS的“魔术文件夹”功能[*]）。

trans-unit.source: Because Tahoe-LAFS has not yet been ported to python3, and because some GNU/Linux distributions might contain especially old versions of some dependencies, it is recommended to install and run Tahoe-LAFS and Gridsync inside their own virtual environments using updated dependencies from PyPI (ideally with hashes verified).
trans-unit.target: 由于Tahoe-LAFS尚未被移植到python3中,并且由于一些GNU/Linux发行版可能包含一些特别老版本的依赖关系,因此建议在自己的虚拟环境中安装和运行Tahoe-LAFS和Gridsync,使用来自PyPI的最新依赖关系(最好是经过哈希验证)。

trans-unit.source: Contributions of any sort (e.g., suggestions, criticisms, bug reports, pull requests) are welcome. Any persons interested in aiding the development of Gridsync are encouraged to do so by opening a GitHub Issue or by contacting its primary developer: chris@gridsync.io
trans-unit.target: 欢迎任何形式的贡献（例如建议，批评，错误报告，请求请求）。鼓励有兴趣帮助Gridsync开发的人员通过打开GitHub Issue或联系其主要开发人员来这样做：chris@gridsync.io

trans-unit.target: 桌面集成– Gridsync可以（可选）在登录时自动启动，并在某些操作完成后提供桌面通知。

trans-unit.source: Downloads for “stable” releases of Gridsync can be found on the project’s GitHub Releases page and include pre-built/binary distrubitions for all three major desktop platforms that have been compiled inside dedicated virtual machines on dedicated hardware. Users wishing to install these packages are strongly urged to verify their signatures before running or, alternatively, to build/install Gridsync manually from source (see below).

trans-unit.target: 将随附的“ Gridsync.app”捆绑包拖到任意位置（例如，

trans-unit.source: Easy sharing – Gridsync uses the magic-wormhole library to provide human-pronounceable “invite codes” for joining storage grids and sharing folders with other users.
trans-unit.target: 轻松共享– Gridsync使用魔术虫库提供了可发音的“邀请代码”，以加入存储网格并与其他用户共享文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Gridsync aims to provide a cross-platform, graphical user interface for Tahoe-LAFS, the Least Authority File Store. It is intended to simplify the Tahoe-LAFS installation and configuration process and ultimately provide user-friendly mechanisms for common use-cases like backing up local files, synchronizing directories between devices, and sharing files and folders with other users across all major desktop platforms (GNU/Linux, macOS, and Windows). More broadly, Gridsync aims to duplicate most of the core functionality provided by other, proprietary “cloud” backup and synchronization services and utilities (such as Dropbox and BitTorrent Sync) but without demanding any sacrifice of the user’s privacy or freedom – and without requiring usage or knowledge of the command line. Accordingly, Gridsync is developed with the goal in mind of making secure cloud storage freely available to everyone, without exception, without added barriers, and regardless of one’s operating system choice.
trans-unit.target: Gridsync旨在为Tahoe-LAFS提供跨平台的图形用户界面，最低权限文件存储。它旨在简化Tahoe-LAFS的安装和配置过程，并最终为常见用例提供用户友好的机制，例如备份本地文件，在设备之间同步目录以及在所有主要桌面平台上与其他用户共享文件和文件夹（ GNU / Linux，macOS和Windows）。更广泛地说，Gridsync旨在复制其他专有的“云”备份和同步服务和实用程序（例如Dropbox和BitTorrent Sync）提供的大多数核心功能，但不要求牺牲用户的隐私或自由-无需使用或对命令行的了解。因此，开发Gridsync的目的是让所有人免费无障碍使用安全的云存储，没有任何障碍，并且不受操作系统选择的影响。

trans-unit.source: Simple recovery – Gridsync’s “Recovery Key” subsystem allows connections and folders to be easily restored from a single file in the event of a disaster.
trans-unit.target: 简单的恢复– Gridsync的“ Recovery Key ”子系统允许在发生灾难时轻松地从单个文件恢复连接和文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Sponsors:
trans-unit.target: 赞助商:

trans-unit.source: Status indicators – the user will know, at a glance, the number of connected storage nodes, folder sizes and modification times, when folders are synchronizing, recently updated files, etc.
trans-unit.target: 状态指示器–用户一眼就能知道已连接的存储节点数，文件夹大小和修改时间，文件夹何时同步，最近更新的文件等。

trans-unit.source: Synchronize local directories with Tahoe-LAFS storage grids.
trans-unit.target: 将本地目录与Tahoe-LAFS存储网格同步。

trans-unit.source: Tahoe-LAFS already provides a number of highly desirable properties for secure file-storage: in addition to offering client-side encryption, it is decentralized, robust, free (as in both beer and speech), stable and mature, and written by a group of very talented developers. Unfortunately – and despite all of its technical merits – Tahoe-LAFS has a number of persistent usability issues which steepen its learning curve: its installation requires manual compilation from source on Windows and macOS, its configuration consists in hand-editing text files, its primary interface requires heavy command line usage, and many of its fundamental concepts (e.g., “dircap”, “shares”, “servers-of-happiness”) are opaque to new users or otherwise demand additional reading of the project’s extensive documentation. Accordingly, Tahoe-LAFS’ userbase consists primarily in seasoned developers and system administrators; non-technical users are naturally excluded from enjoying Tahoe-LAFS’s aforementioned advantages.
trans-unit.target: Tahoe-LAFS已经为安全的文件存储提供了许多非常理想的属性：除了提供客户端加密之外，它还具有分散性，健壮性，免费性（在啤酒和语音中均是如此），稳定且成熟，并且由非常有才华的开发人员群体。不幸的是-尽管具有所有技术优势，但Tahoe-LAFS仍然存在许多持续的可用性问题，这加剧了其学习难度：其安装需要在Windows和macOS上从源代码进行手动编译，其配置包括手动编辑文本文件，其主要界面需要大量的命令行使用，并且它的许多基本概念（例如，“ dircap”，“ shares”，“ happys-of-appiness”）对新用户而言是不透明的，否则将需要进一步阅读该项目的大量文档。因此，Tahoe-LAFS的用户群主要由经验丰富的开发人员和系统管理员组成。非技术用户自然无法享受Tahoe-LAFS的上述优势。

trans-unit.source: Tahoe-LAFS’ “Magic Folder” functionality is not (yet) fully supported on macOS or other BSD-based operating systems and is presently marked as experimental.
trans-unit.target: Mac OS或其他基于BSD的操作系统尚不完全支持Tahoe-LAFS的“魔术文件夹”功能，目前已标记为试验性。

trans-unit.source: The Gridsync project intends to overcome some of Tahoe-LAFS’s usability barriers by means of following features:
trans-unit.target: Gridsync项目旨在通过以下功能克服Tahoe-LAFS的可用性障碍：

trans-unit.source: While Gridsync ultimately aims to provide an easy-to-use frontend for users of Tahoe-LAFS, at present, its interface only supports a very limited subset of Tahoe-LAFS’s underlying features and potential use-cases (namely, it provides simplified means for joining storage grids, creating and sharing “magic-folders,” and receiving status updates and notifications pertaining to those processes). Accordingly, users should not (yet) expect Gridsync to provide a complete backup solution or to serve as a stand-in replacement for other tools with robust sharing and collaboration capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Gridsync最终旨在为Tahoe-LAFS用户提供易于使用的前端，但目前，其界面仅支持Tahoe-LAFS基本功能和潜在用例的非常有限的子集（即，它为加入存储网格，创建和共享“魔术文件夹”，以及接收与这些进程有关的状态更新和通知。因此，用户不应（尚未）期望Gridsync提供完整的备份解决方案或替代具有健壮的共享和协作功能的其他工具。
